name: Time Merge . Demo
description:
The way forward is to let go of the past. The way to heavens is to remember it.

Time Merge is a student game project developed in 4 months. This sokoban style puzzle game takes place in two parallel universes. The solution is scattered between the two.

This game was written from scratch*. The tools and the game were written in C/C++. Don't forget to checkout the engine that ships with the game if you're curious.

Checkout this blog post that outlines the story behind the development of this game: https://matink.substack.com/p/timemerge-a-student-custom-engine

How To Play:

The game has a tutorial that teaches the gameplay. Here's an outline of the keys for your convenience:

  • [Arrow Keys] Move
  • [Space] Travel to the other universe
  • [Z] Undo once
  • [R] Reset level
  • [ESC] Pause
  • [F11] Toggle fullscreen
The Engine:

To checkout the engine, download "Time Merge - Game and Engine". Please read the "how to use engine" file to learn how to navigate the editors.
